caption.p: 3D binding modes, hydrogen bonding (shown as green dotted lines), and electrostatic interactions (shown as orang dotted lines) of compounds 18b, 19a, and 20a (shown as sticks) into CDK-6 (pdb: 2EUF) and CDK-9 (pdb: 3TNH): (A) compound 18b into CDK-6; (B) compound 19a into CDK-6; (C) compound 20a into CDK-6; (D) compound 18b into CDK-9; (E) compound 19a into CDK-9; (F) compound 20a into CDK-9, amino acid residues shown as lines coloured by element, hydrogen atoms were omitted for clarity.
